Numbers__20.11__The rock: : This rock was a figure of Christ, and the water that issued out from the rock, of his precious blood, the source of all our good.
Numbers__20.12__You have not believed: : The fault of Moses and Aaron, on this occasion, was a certain diffidence and weakness of faith; not doubting of God's power or veracity; but apprehending the unworthiness of that rebellious and incredulous people, and therefore speaking with some ambiguity.
